name: Don't Look Away (GG_Development)
description:
A game made for Coding Block Game Jam 22

Simple top-down movement with a limited view of your surroundings. Move cautiously and evade the statue.  - You can only see up to three tiles in front of you (The stone statue will always go towards you, but if you are looking at it. It will keep a distance of 3 tiles. This is important if you want to complete the puzzles, especially level 3)

This is my very first game I've ever released. I hope you will enjoy it even though there are many bugs.

(The statue are hugely inspired by the Weeping angels' from Doctor Who)
